info.description: Microsoft Dynamics 365 is a cloud based service that provides a set of intelligent applications that seamlessly work together â€” unifying the capabilities of CRM business software and ERP systems.

get.description: This operation gets records for an entity

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Name of Dynamics 365 organization like Contoso

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of the entity

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Related entries to include with requested entries (default = none)

parameters.name: fetchXml
parameters.description: Defines columns to return, entities to join and filters to apply to build the resulting list of entries
